game_description: VRflow B737NG is the interactive cockpit procedure trainer for pilots, used by airlines worldwide. Train procedures in training scenarios that incorporate detailed aircraft behavior including sounds, instruments and cockpit layout. VRflow incorporates numerous features for efficient learning and aircraft familiarization, ideal for type ratings. Train with or without visual help, track your errors, see your training time, train with an automatic crewmember and much more. This demo version only includes the Preflight Procedure â€“ First Officer procedure. Buy the full version for access to a total of 14 normal procedures and 3 emergency/abnormal procedures. Explore Mode, where you can explore the cockpit and learn about systems, is also included in the full version.
